feed.title: Tasks.md Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tasks.md: 2.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Generate an initial color for a new tags based on their names by @Akashic101 in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/110
  • Feature: Add new tag name input validation by @Akashic101 and @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/110
  • Fix: Use environment variables in Dockerfile ENTRYPOINT by @tarikalim in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/116
  • Fix: Allow dragging cards when sort is applied by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/116
  • Fix: Fix many visual issues

New Contributors

  • @tarikalim made their first contribution in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/116
  • @Akashic101 made their first contribution in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/110

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/compare/2.4.1...2.5.0

entry.title: New release for Tasks.md: 2.5.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix build
  • Downgrade node to 18 by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/126

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/compare/2.5.2...2.5.3
